segments.text: Is this the workshop to prepare for an interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the interview class . Welcome to our class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am really excited to be taking this workshop so that I can get ready for my interview next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are all learning things that will help us in our interview . What do you think are some important considerations going into your interview ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that we should dress neatly and appropriately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Second , as you can imagine , attitude and friendliness go a long way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and I always feel much better when I am friendly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Believe it or not , the interviewers are as interested in your questions as they are in your answers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Any more hints as to what I should do in an interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Always be honest with your answers . The interviewers really do want to know if you will be a good fit for them .
segments.speaker: S2
